Field.FormMenuDescription: Fecal Incontinence Quality of Life Scale
Field.ElementLabel: Q 1: In general, would you say your health is:

ElementEnum.RawValue:
5, 1 - Excellent 
 4, 2 -Very Good 
 3, 3 - Good 
 2, 4 - Fair 
 1, 5 - Poor

Field.ElementPreceedingHeader: Q 2: For each of the items, please indicate how much of the time the issue is a concern for you <u>due to accidental bowel leakage</u>.
Field.ElementLabel: a. I am afraid to go out

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 1 - Most of the Time 
2, 2 - Some of the Time
3, 3 - A Little of the Time
 4, 4 - None of the Time

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 1 - Most of the Time 
2, 2 - Some of the Time
3, 3 - A Little of the Time
 4, 4 - None of the Time

3, 3 - A Little of the Time
 4, 4 - None of the Time

 4, 4 - None of the Time

Field.ElementLabel: Q 4: During the past month, have you felt so sad, discouraged, hopeless, or had so many problems that you wondered if anything was worthwhile?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 1 - Extremely So - To the point that I have just about given up 
 2, 2 - Very Much So 
 3, 3 - Quite a Bit 
 4, 4 - Some - Enough to bother me 
 5, 5 - A Little Bit 
 6, 6 - Not At All

StructuredValue.Value: 1 - Extremely So - To the point that I have just about given up
